amphetamine-use-disorders-drugUseDisorde.def:
Amphetamine dependence is a substance-related disorder involving a dysfunctional pattern of amphetamine use. Included in the GBD disease modelling were cases meeting DSM or ICD diagnostic criteria.
Amphetamine use disorders resulted in 1·40 million (95% UI 0·954–2·04) global DALYs in 2019 and were responsible for 0·1% (0·0–0·1) of total global DALYs.
amphetamine-use-disorders-drugUseDisorde.name: Amphetamine use disorders

cannabis-use-disorders-drugUseDisorders.def:
Cannabis dependence is a substance-related disorder involving a dysfunctional pattern of cannabis use meeting DSM or ICD diagnostic criteria.
Cannabis use disorders resulted in 690 000 (95% UI 421 000–1 080 000) global YLDs in 2019 and were responsible for 0·08% (0·05–0·1) of total global YLDs. 65·7% (64·8–66·6) of global DALYs from cannabis use disorders were among males.
cannabis-use-disorders-drugUseDisorders.name: Cannabis use disorders

cocaine-use-disorders-drugUseDisorders.def:
Cocaine dependence is a substance-related disorder involving a dysfunctional pattern of cocaine use. Included in the GBD disease modelling were cases meeting DSM or ICD diagnostic criteria.
Cocaine use disorders resulted in 1·15 million (95% UI 0·933–1·43) global DALYs in 2019 and were responsible for 0·05% (0·04–0·06) of total global DALYs.
cocaine-use-disorders-drugUseDisorders.name: Cocaine use disorders

opioid-use-disorders-drugUseDisorders.def:
This cause includes deaths from opioid overdose in adults and deaths in neonates attributed to the mother’s opioid use. For disability, we make estimates for opioid dependence as defined by either DSM or ICD diagnostic criteria.
Opioid use disorders resulted in 12·9 million (95% UI 10·0–16·2) global DALYs in 2019 and 0·5% (0·4–0·6) of total global DALYs. In 2019, males accounted for 72·2% (70·6–73·9) of total global opioid overdose deaths.
opioid-use-disorders-drugUseDisorders.name: Opioid use disorders

other-drug-use-disorders-drugUseDisorder.def:
Other drug use disorders is a residual category for substance-related disorders including deaths and disability due to dependence on hallucinogens, inhalants, solvents, and sedatives.
Other drug use disorders resulted in 1·95 million (95% UI 1·54–2·49) global DALYs in 2019 and was responsible for 0·08% (0·06–0·09) of total global DALYs.
other-drug-use-disorders-drugUseDisorder.name: Other drug use disorders
